SEARCH
Package com.ts8t.objects

Class AreaMap

java.lang.Object
com.ts8t.objects.AreaMap
public class AreaMap extends Object
Author:
Rob Kempf

An AreaMap is a set of nodes that know how to link together. It also contains points of interest at other Locations. AreaMap can be constructed from an OpenStreetMap XML file. https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Elements

    • addUniqueNode

      public boolean addUniqueNode(Node node)
      Make sure all new nodes in this AreaMap have a unique earthKey (ThreadSafe)
      Parameters:
      node - is new node for AreaMap
      Returns:
      true if unique, then node added to AreaMap, even if earthKey is zero (undefined) false if earthKey already exists in the AreaMap, then node NOT added to AreaMap
